DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine safety efficacy dexamethasone iontophoretic transdermal patch treatment pain associate lateral epicondylitis ( tennis elbow ) .
DOC.brief_title: Dexamethasone Iontophoretic Patch Treatment Pain Associated With Lateral Epicondylitis
DOC.detailed_description: Detailed Description : This trial randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group trial subject diagnose lateral epicondylitis ( tennis elbow ) . Subjects enter trial assign one four treatment group . The total duration 13 day trial participation .
